entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
